short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays as a percentage the price over spot being charged on all Ainslie Bullion items.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This browser extension is for Ainslie Bullion. It finds product listings and updates their UI to display the percentage above the market spot price they are selling each item for. This is often referred to as the premium.
